Name: Archive.today

Name: Lumen
Description: A research project collecting and publishing legal takedown notices for online content transparency

Description: A research project collecting and publishing legal takedown notices for online content transparency

Name: Atlos

Name: Gephi

Name: Logseq

Name: Maltego Graph

Name: Obsidian

Name: QGIS

Name: RAWGraphs

Name: GeoNames

Name: Photo-Map.RU

Name: Shadow Finder

Name: ShadowMap
Description: Global map of 3D buildlings and the shadows they cast at a specific time a day

Name: SunCalc
Description: Suncalc models the relationship between the date, time of day, the geographic location of a place, and the position of the sun in the sky, together with the length & direction of the shadows it casts.

VFF is a web application that serves as a web engine to perform searches for faces over an user-defined image dataset. It is based on the original application created by VGG to perform visual searchers over a large dataset of images from BBC News.

Name: AmIReal

Name: IPVM Calculator

VIC is a web application that serves as a web engine to perform image classification queries over an user-defined image dataset. It is based on the original application created by VGG to perform visual searchers over a large dataset of images from BBC News.

Description: A collection of web-based image forensics tools. Can identify fake or doctored images.
